content: All fixed set patterns are incapable of adaptability or pliability. The truth is outside of all fixed patterns.
author: Bruce Lee
Ted Williams
content: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

content: Write your plans in pencil and give God the eraser.
author: Paulo Coelho

content: If you want your life to be more rewarding, you have to change the way you think.
author: Oprah Winfrey

content: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
author: Michael Jordan

content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: A wise man is superior to any insults which can be put upon him, and the best reply to unseemly behavior is patience and moderation.
author: Molière

content: The only way to tell the truth is to speak with kindness. Only the words of a loving man can be heard.
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: Bad times have a scientific value. These are occasions a good learner would not miss.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

content: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

content: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.
author: Pablo Picasso

content: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
author: Bernard Shaw

content: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
author: John Locke

content: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
author: Sri Chinmoy

content: When you begin to touch your heart or let your heart be touched, you begin to discover that it's bottomless.
author: Pema Chödrön
Albert Einstein
content: Imagination is more important than knowledge...
What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
author: Confucius

content: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
author: George Washington

content: The most formidable weapon against errors of every kind is reason.
author: Thomas Paine

content: Sometimes I am happy and sometimes not. I am, after all, a human being, you know. And I am glad that we are sometimes happy and sometimes not. You get your wisdom working by having different emotions.
author: Yoko Ono

content: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

content: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence.
author: Frederick Douglass

content: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: The Buddha

content: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: What sweetness is left in life, if you take away friendship? Robbing life of friendship is like robbing the world of the sun. A true friend is more to be esteemed than kinsfolk.
author: Cicero

content: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
author: Laozi

content: I am not bothered by the fact that I am unknown. I am bothered when I do not know others.
author: Confucius

content: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
author: Archimedes

content: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John Locke

content: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was within me an invincible summer.
author: Albert Camus

content: There surely is in human nature an inherent propensity to extract all the good out of all the evil.
author: Benjamin Haydon

content: Wisdom alone is the science of other sciences.
author: Plato

content: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

content: The world has the habit of making room for the man whose actions show that he knows where he is going.
author: Napoleon Hill

content: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
author: Elbert Hubbard

content: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
author: Jim Rohn

content: You cannot have what you do not want.
author: John Acosta
Peter Drucker
content: The entrepreneur always searches for change, responds to it, and exploits it as an opportunity.
To be happy is to be able to become aware of oneself without fright.
author: Walter Benjamin

content: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
author: Richard Whately

content: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
author: Joe Namath

content: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

content: We may encounter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

content: Never mistake activity for achievement.
author: John Wooden

content: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
author: Yogi Berra
William Shakespeare
content: Action is eloquence.
Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

content: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
author: Ernest Hemingway

content: The universe is transformation; our life is what our thoughts make it.
author: Marcus Aurelius
